reference.title: cxxClass module
reference.shortdesc: Defines a top-level container for all the elements necessary to describe an C++ API class.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxClass> topic type contains elements necessary to show the name, short description, syntax and usage of a class.

<cxxClass> also contains all the elements to describe the member variables and functions. To do this insert cxxFunction, cxxDefine, cxxVariable, cxxEnumeration or cxxTypedef elements into the cxxClass module.
The cxxClass topic contains the following elements:
